titles.ar: باب ثَوَابِ مَنْ غَسَّلَ مُؤْمِناً
titles.en: Chapter 33 – Rewards of the one who washes a Believer
Chapter 34 – Rewards of the one who enshrouds a Believer

titles.ar: باب الْعِلَّةِ فِي غُسْلِ الْمَيِّتِ غُسْلَ الْجَنَابَةِ
titles.en: Chapter 32 – The reason regarding washing the deceased and washing from the sexual impurity

titles.ar: باب ثَوَابِ مَنْ غَسَّلَ مُؤْمِناً
titles.en: Chapter 33 – Rewards of the one who washes a Believer

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف على المشهور - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (3/346)

narrator_chain.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ سَهْلِ بْنِ زِيَادٍ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ غَالِبٍ عَنْ سَعْدٍ الْإِسْكَافِ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ قَالَ

text: أَيُّمَا مُؤْمِنٍ غَسَّلَ مُؤْمِناً فَقَالَ إِذَا قَلَّبَهُ اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّ هَذَا بَدَنُ عَبْدِكَ الْمُؤْمِنِ قَدْ أَخْرَجْتَ رُوحَهُ مِنْهُ وَ فَرَّقْتَ بَيْنَهُمَا فَعَفْوَكَ عَفْوَكَ غَفَرَ اللَّهُ لَهُ ذُنُوبَ سَنَةٍ إِلَّا الْكَبَائِرَ .

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Sahl Bin Ziyad, from Al Hassan Bin Mahboub, from Abdullah Bin Ghalib, from Sa’ad Al Iskaf,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘Whichever Believer washes a Believer and he says when facing him, ‘O Allah<sup>azwj</sup>! This is a body of Your<sup>azwj</sup> Believing servant. His soul has come out from him, and there is a separation between the two. Your<sup>azwj</sup> Forgiveness, Your<sup>azwj</sup> Forgiveness (for him)’, Allah<sup>azwj</sup> would Forgive for him sixty years of sins except for the major sins’.
en.sarwar: 1. A number of our people have narrated from Sahl ibn Ziyad from al-Hassan ibn Mahbub from ‘Abd Allah ibn Ghalib from Sa‘d al-Iskaf who has said the following: “This is a Hadith of abu Ja’far, ‘Alayhi al-Salam. He (the Imam) has said, Tf any believer, when washing the dead body of a believer says, “O Allah, this is the body of Your believing servant from which its spirit has come out and is just separated, please grant him forgiveness, and please grant him forgiveness.’” Allah then forgives his one year’s sins except the major ones.”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مختلف فيه - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (13/346)

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ سَعْدِ بْنِ طَرِيفٍ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: مَنْ غَسَّلَ مَيِّتاً فَأَدَّى فِيهِ الْأَمَانَةَ غَفَرَ اللَّهُ لَهُ قُلْتُ وَ كَيْفَ يُؤَدِّي فِيهِ الْأَمَانَةَ قَالَ لَا يُحَدِّثُ بِمَا يَرَى .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Sa’ad Bin Tareyf,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The one who washes a deceased and fulfills the entrustments with regards to him, Allah<sup>azwj</sup> would Forgive him’. I said, ‘And would he fulfill the entrustments with regards to him?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘He would not narrate with what he saw’.
en.sarwar: 2. Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from his father from ibn abu ‘Um ay r from Sa‘d ibn Tarif who has said the following: “Abu Ja’far, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said, Tf one washes a dead body and keeps the trust, Allah grants him forgiveness.’ He was asked, ‘What is the trust?’ The Imam replied, ‘Does not make public whatever he sees.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: حسن - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (13/346)

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ حَمَّادِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ إِبْرَاهِيمَ بْنِ عُمَرَ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: مَا مِنْ مُؤْمِنٍ يُغَسِّلُ مُؤْمِناً وَ يَقُولُ وَ هُوَ يُغَسِّلُهُ رَبِّ عَفْوَكَ عَفْوَكَ إِلَّا عَفَا اللَّهُ عَنْهُ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Hammad Bin Isa, from Ibrahim Bin Umar,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘There is none from a Believer who washes a Believer and is saying while washing him, ‘Lord<sup>azwj</sup>! Your Forgiveness, Your<sup>azwj</sup> Forgiveness (for him)’, except that Allah<sup>azwj</sup> would Forgive him’.
en.sarwar: 3. Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from his father from Hammad ibn ‘Isa from Ibrahim ibn ‘Umar who has said the following: “Abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said, ‘Any believing person who when washing the dead body of a believing person says, “O Allah grant him forgiveness,” Allah then grants forgiveness to him also.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (13/347)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ ابْنِ سِنَانٍ عَنْ أَبِي الْجَارُودِ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: كَانَ فِيمَا نَاجَى اللَّهَ بِهِ مُوسَى قَالَ يَا رَبِّ مَا لِمَنْ غَسَّلَ الْمَوْتَى فَقَالَ أَغْسِلُهُ مِنْ ذُنُوبِهِ كَمَا وَلَدَتْهُ أُمُّهُ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Mhammad, from Ibn Sinan, from Abu Al Jaroud,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘Among what Musa<sup>as</sup> whispered to Allah<sup>azwj</sup> with, was: ‘O Lord<sup>azwj</sup>! What is for the one who washes the dead?’ So He<sup>azwj</sup> Said: “I<sup>azwj</sup> would Wash him from his sins to just as he was when his mother gave birth to him’.
en.sarwar: 4. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from ibn Sinan from abu al-Jarud who has said the following: “Abu Ja‘far, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said, ‘One of the matters that Moses spoke about before Allah was this, “O Allah, what is the reward for one who washes a dead body?” The answer was, “I wash his sins as if his mother has just given him birth.’””
